name: Environmental Stewardship Reading Plan
description: A 7-day reading plan exploring the biblical theme of environmental stewardship, highlighting God's creation and our responsibility to care for it.

readings.why_selected: To understand God's original intention for creation and our role in caring for it.
To see the beauty and wonder of God's creation.
To understand the consequences of humanity's sin on the environment.
To see the effects of human greed and exploitation on creation.

days.outline: God's Call to Care for Creation

readings.why_selected: To understand God's command to care for the earth.
To see the importance of living sustainably and responsibly.

days.outline: The Kingdom of God and Creation

readings.why_selected: To understand the relationship between God's kingdom and creation.
To see the hope of restoration and renewal in God's kingdom.
To understand our personal responsibility to care for creation.
To see the importance of living a simple and sustainable lifestyle.
To understand the importance of community in caring for creation.
To see the role of churches and communities in environmental stewardship.
To reflect on the importance of environmental stewardship.
To be inspired to take action in caring for creation.
